info.name: Superior petrosal dural venous sinus
info.description: Each of the paired superior petrosal dural venous sinuses runs from the cavernous sinus to join the ipsilateral transverse sinus at the junction of the transverse sinus with the sigmoid sinus.  The superior petrosal sinus lies in the anterolateral attached margin of the cerebellar tentorium where it attaches to the superior border of the petrous portion of the temporal bone.
